author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BMW Says Stefan Quandt's Holding Rises To 25.83 Pct
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - BMW:
* SAYS STEFAN QUANDT‘S HOLDING IN COMPANY RISES TO 25.83 PERCENT AS OF FEB. 15 VERSUS 17.64 PERCENT PREVIOUSLY‍​‍​
* SAYS STEFAN QUANDT DOES NOT INTEND TO OBTAIN FURTHER VOTING RIGHTS DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY BY ACQUISITION OR ANY OTHER WAY WITHIN THE NEXT 12 MTHS‍​
* SAYS CHANGE IN QUANDT‘S HOLDING RELATED TO WITHDRAWAL OF SUSANNE KLATTEN BETEILIGUNGS GMBH FROM BOTH JOHANNA QUANDT GMBH AND AQTON GMBH & CO. KG FÜR AUTOMOBILWERTE​‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
